hero.headline: Reliable staffing for hotels, factories & farms
hero.subtext: We source motivated employees, arrange visas and onboarding, and make sure every contract is 100 % compliant with Bulgarian legislation.

about.title: Who we are
about.text: Bulstaff is a licensed recruitment agency based in Varna. Since 2015 we have been connecting Bulgarian employers with skilled and seasonal staff from the EU and third countries. Our consultants handle every step — from candidate screening to work‑permit paperwork — so clients can stay focused on their core business.
